update wall_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head = #{head,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_date = #{schoolDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_province = #{locationProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_city = #{locationCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_county = #{locationCounty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = now(), gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.username,s.head,s.school_name,s.location_province, s.location_city,s.location_county,s.gender,s.nickname from wall_user s left join well_start_activity t on s.id = t.userId where t.activityId = #{activityId}
